text: Henri "Heng" Freylinger (23 September 1926 - 17 January 2017)Obituary in Luxemburger Wort, 20 January 2017, p. 75 was a Luxembourgian wrestler. He competed in the Greco-Roman welterweight event at the 1952 Summer Olympics. In 2008 he was given the Order of Merit of Luxembourg for his service to the state in sports. Freylinger was a 12-time Luxembourgeous champion. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Olympians for Luxembourg Category:Wrestlers
title: Heng Freylinger
